name: @cossistant/types
author: Cossistant Team
description: Shared TypeScript types for Cossistant packages

scripts.pub:release: bun run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.pub:beta: bun run build && npm publish --access public --tag beta --no-git-checks
scripts.pub:next: bun run build && npm publish --access public --tag next --no-git-checks
